Privacy Policy

Last updated: April 2025

Fund-a-Paw (“we”, “us”) respects your privacy. This Policy explains what data we collect, how we use it, and your choices.

What we collect

  • Contact info you provide (name, email, phone).
  • Donation details (amount, currency, receipt email). Payment info is processed by Stripe; we do not store card numbers.
  • Usage data (pages viewed, interactions) to improve our services.

How we use data

  • Process donations and send receipts.
  • Provide progress updates and newsletters if you opt in.
  • Prevent fraud, comply with law, and improve the platform.

Sharing

We share data only with service providers (e.g., Stripe) under contract, and the shelter benefiting from a donation as needed to provide updates.

Your choices

  • Unsubscribe from emails at any time.
  • Request access, correction, or deletion of your data: privacy@fundapaw.org.

Security

Transactions are handled by Stripe (PCI DSS Level 1). We use HTTPS and follow industry best practices.

Contact

Questions? Email privacy@fundapaw.org.
